item.title: The current mainstream CEX and DEX funding rate displays a divergence in market trend, with bearish and neutral views coexisting.
item.description: On August 4th, according to Coinglass data, the current funding rates of mainstream CEX and DEX show a divergent market trend, with both bearish and neutral sentiments. The specific funding rates for mainstream coins are shown in the attached image.BlockBeats Note: The funding rate is a fee set by cryptocurrency trading platforms to maintain the balance between the contract price and the underlying asset price. It is usually applicable to perpetual contracts and is a mechanism for the exchange of funds between long and short traders. The trading platform does not charge this fee. It is used to adjust the cost or profit of traders holding contracts to keep the contract price close to the underlying asset price.When the funding rate is 0.01%, it represents the baseline rate. When the funding rate is greater than 0.01%, it indicates a generally bullish market. When the funding rate is less than 0.005%, it signifies a generally bearish market.

item.title: Analyst: Rate Cut Expectation Heating Up in Tandem with SEC's New Policy, Market Sentiment Improving
item.description: On August 4th, according to The Block, Vincent Liu, the Chief Investment Officer of Kronos Research, stated that in the midst of macroeconomic uncertainty and institutional buying, the current market is demonstrating a sense of "cautious optimism." The Fear and Greed Index is moving towards "greed," and whale accumulation and expectations of rate cuts are driving traders to reallocate risk assets.Investors are focusing on the U.S. July CPI data, which will be released on August 12th, as a key indicator for the next interest rate hike or cut decision. Although the Fed maintained rates at the July FOMC meeting and Powell stated that a September rate cut still depends on economic data, CME FedWatch data shows that the market expects a probability of more than 80% for a 0.25 percentage point cut.Furthermore, Liu believes that the U.S. SEC's "Project Crypto" could be beneficial to the market in the medium to long term. This project will reduce regulatory uncertainty, promote the growth

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Movement: Over Ten Million USDC Transferred in 4 Hours: Whale Holding an ETH Short Position Still Faces a Floating Loss of Over 17 Million US Dollars
item.description: On August 4th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight, in the past 4 hours, there have been large fund movements in multiple whale addresses:【Withdrawal】The whale starting with address 0xd8efD7Ef9 withdrew approximately $2.01 million USDC;The whale starting with address 0x53baBE7 withdrew approximately $3 million USDC;The whale starting with address 0x5Bc43f38 withdrew approximately $2.6 million USDC;The whale starting with address 0x9CBF09 has withdrawn a total of $3.6 million USDC in the past 24 hours;【Deposit】The whale starting with address 0x5b5d512 deposited approximately $5 million USDC;The whale starting with address 0xB83DE012 deposited approximately $4 million USDC;Some whales have adjusted their contract positions:The whale starting with address 0x20c2d9 reduced its ETH short position by 1,017.96 coins and is currently holding an unrealized loss of about $17.43 million (with a liquidation p

item.title: Solana Network DEX's trading volume has surpassed $1.4 billion in the last 24 hours, ranking second across the network
item.description: On August 4th, according to data from DefiLlama, the DEX trading volume on the Solana network reached $14.13 billion in the past 24 hours, ranking second among all networks.In the Solana ecosystem, the top three DEX protocols by trading volume are Raydium, Meteora, and Pump.

item.title: British Former Chancellor: UK is Behind in the Cryptocurrency Space
item.description: August 4th. As per the Financial Times, the former UK Chancellor George Osborne launched a vehement assault on the Labour government's stance towards cryptocurrency. He cautioned that the UK might miss out on a "financial revolution analogous to that of the 1980s" and lag behind the trend.Osborne is currently a member of the Global Advisory Board of the US cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase. He stated that Chancellor Rishi Sunak and Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey are placing the UK on the slower track. Osborne said, "Rachel Reeves is correct. We have all become overly risk-averse. We became the world's financial center because we were not afraid of change. The harsh truth is that, just like many other aspects, we are completely behind in cryptocurrency and stablecoins. It is time to catch up."Osborne asserted that blaming regulators for being overly cautious is an "unsustainable excuse." Reeves should take the lead from the US Congress and establish a legal framework for cryp

item.title: OKX Wallet will upgrade its Web端自动确认 functionality on August 4th, with the update expected to be completed within this week.
item.description: On August 4th, according to official information, OKX announced that the OKX Wallet will upgrade its Web automatic confirmation feature on August 4, 2025, and it is anticipated to be completed within this week. During the upgrade period, the automatic confirmation feature will be temporarily unavailable; however, manual transaction signing will not be impacted.

item.title: USDe Circulation Surpasses 9.3 Billion, Reaching an All-Time High
item.description: On August 4th, based on the data from the official website, the supply of the stablecoin USDe issued by Ethena Labs has surpassed 9.3 billion. Currently, it is around 9,310,382,206 USDe, reaching a new record high. This indicates a substantial increase of more than 75% compared to the issuance of 5.31 billion USDe a month ago.

item.title: Binance BNSOL Super Staking Launches SIGN (SIGN)
item.description: On August 4th, as per an official announcement, Binance has declared that the BNSOL Super Staking will incorporate the twelfth project - SIGN (SIGN), a multi-chain authentication protocol that offers digital public infrastructure for governments and serves as the foundational layer for decentralized applications by validating identity, ownership proof, and contracts.From August 5, 2025, at 08:00 to September 6, 2025, at 07:59 (UTC+8), users who complete the following actions will be eligible to receive a SIGN APR Boost airdrop reward:1. Binance Account - Possessing BNSOL or staking SOL to BNSOL; or2. Binance Wallet - Holding BNSOL, sBNSOL, or bzSOL.

item.title: Upbit Trading Volume Continues to Decline: XRP, ETH, BTC Remain Top Three
item.description: On August 4th, based on CoinGecko data, in the past 24 hours, Upbit's trading volume decreased to $16.34 billion. The XRP/KRW trading pair accounted for 29.08% of the volume, taking the lead in the Korean won market. The rest of the top five in trading volume are: ETH, BTC, ENA, and TON.

item.title: Letsbonk's Solana Launchpad market share in the last 24 hours has risen to 65.2%, while pump.fun has fallen to 23.1%.
item.description: On August 4th, according to the Jupiter Data Dashboard, in the Solana issuance platform market share ranking within the past 24 hours, Letsbonk took the first place with 65.2%, pump.fun came in second with 23.1%, and BAGS ranked third with 4.41%.
